name: Florsheim in Men's
description:
This is a pair of unique dress shoes made by Florsheim in Men's size 7 1/2 Wide/D fit.
 They are burgundy/brown and feature a wooden under-sole & heel, stitched & imprinted patterns and a cut leather flap with a double tassle stringed to front. This pair also comes in with fitted, vintage metal & wooden shoe horns. 
 They were made in India with leather and wooden materials. 
 The shoes measure 11 from heel to toe, 4 at the ball of foot and 3 1/2 up the shaft of the heel. 
 These dress shoes come in good pre-owned condition with slight scuffs here and there and a slightly worn under-sole.
